description: The Kama Sutra is the oldest and most notable of a group of texts known generically as Kama Shastra… and now it comes to your Palm in a light and irreverent way. With endless fun and lighthearted illustrations surrounding love, and romance, the Kamasutra contains hundreds of romantic gestures, whimsical illustrations and instructions on the ancient art of romance. The guide contains no nude photography or illustrations.  The application is constantly updated to include new and playful entries! Check back often!  The Kama Sutra is not a sex guide but purely for entertainment and amusement.
